column4: hey i am using lucid 10.10 .. with a maudio 1010lt ... and there is no output :::( .. alsamixer shows the card fine and envy24control is as well
when i play something there is nothing happenig on the pcms
make sure your sound output is directing to the maudio
every thing was working great it was hardy heron machine i upgraded
how do you mean as in hw:0,0 ?
default .. used to be just fine for it..
i am using 10.10.. you think there is some problem been introduced?
i can only select combinations of surround sound + IEC958
you can't change your hardware/input/out or profile?  Abnormal ...
When using my presonus interface, sound preferences was where I went to direct the stream.  I suggest you play around with all those settings until you find the one that works.
awww man 10.10 seems so nice :( .. cant i boot a different kernel i think the ice1712 module is foobar
dmichael   you can install a RT kernel ...
k.. yep sound preferences only gives me combinations of digital input and output and digital surround sound
